listing.listing_description:
Twin Villas Natai are identical beachfront homes along Natai Beach in southern Thailand. Sharing an ample estate with sweeping ocean views and a wide lawn fronting the beach's pristine white sand, the villas can be rented individually or together (with the option of joining their interior living areas). Individually, this five-bedroom vacation rental features a lovely pool terrace with massage sala, superbly appointed interiors, and family-friendly bedrooms including four king suites and a bunk room. The talented private staff includes a villa manager and chef.

The terrace and yard form an enchanting venue for playful and sumptuous relaxation. Enjoy a refreshing dip in your private pool and sunbathe on lounge chairs facing the horizon. Play games in the yard and plunge into the turquoise waters of the Andaman Sea. Embark on the villa's kayaks and paddleboards, or ride bicycles through the coconut groves of the Phang Nga region. Return to afternoon barbeques, sunset strolls, and nighttime cocktails under the stars.

A vanishing wall joins the terrace with the interior great room, forming a seamless living space infused with ocean views. The expansive guest kitchen serves a comfortable lounge and a beautiful dining table for fourteen. Ceiling fans complement the breeze, while air conditioning keeps you cool when necessary. The décor blends contemporary style and Thailand's rustic traditional spirit into a luminous and natural minimalism, accentuating the lush surroundings and abundant ocean light.

A dreamy koi pond separates the great room from the villa's two-story bedroom pavilion. Three bedrooms are located on the garden level, while the upper floor includes two ocean-view suites with a shared balcony. Each bedroom includes an ensuite bathroom, desk, safe, and TV. One of the king beds can be arranged as two twin beds, and there is an additional sofa bed in the bunk room.

Relatively undeveloped compared to Thailand's more popular resort destinations, the ten-kilometer Natai Beach offers a rare degree of seclusion and serenity—with just the right amount of restaurants, resorts, and eco-adventures nearby. Baba Beach Club and Akyra Beach Club offer superb nightlife and dining options, while the sublime limestone cliffs and enchanting islands of Phang Nga Bay are within easy reach. Sarasin Bridge is your gateway to Phuket Island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located right on the sandy beachfront of Natai, this luxurious five bedroom makes it easy to pop into the ocean for a quick dip without having to worry about of the logistical stresses that can come with a trip to the beach. With a collection of bicycles, kayaks, and other beach activities, as well as an included housekeeper and chef, you’ll have a completely stress free getaway at Twin Villas Natai’s South Villa. Within a short drive, you’ll find shopping, golf, restaurants, historical sites, and the vibrant town of Phuket, all yours to discover on your next incredible Thai vacation.

South Villa’s open concept interior and wall length sliding doorway to the terrace create an ideal social setting for a group of eleven. If you require even more space, the North Villa can be rented as well, which would double the accommodations simply by opening the sliding doors that link the two villas. Inside, you’ll appreciate the modern architectural design, high vaulted ceilings, designer furniture, and state of the art electronics that decorate South Villa.

Outside, you and your group will have plenty of space to gather as one, or break away for more intimate moments, making use of the many sitting areas, spacious lawn, and beachfront. Afternoons spent lounging by the pool, barbecuing, or playing beach volleyball at South Villa will be unforgettable.

There’s plenty to see and do on Phang Nga and, nearby, Phuket Island. If there’s a golfer in the group, the island is home to several award-winning courses, the nearest being at Blue Canyon Country Club, just ten kilometers from the Sarasin Bridge, that connects Phuket to Phang Nga. For shopping, Central Festival Mall is a great place to find a wide range of items from souvenir to high-end fashion. If you’re in the mood to explore Thailand’s rugged natural environment, Phang Nga Bay Park and Khao Lak National Park are great for hiking and bird watching. And, if you’d like to dine out, Baba Beach Club has an incredible beachfront bar and restaurant, just 2 kilometers from home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Baan Ora Chorn is a beautiful villa perched along Lipa Noi Beach on the west coast of Koh Samui. The villa's exquisite design brings together traditional Southeast Asian elements with a modern sensibility and high-end comforts, harmonizing with its stunning natural surroundings. Ample outdoor spaces include a pool terrace, multiple ocean-view balconies, and a beachfront alfresco dining pavilion, while the villa's extraordinary staff includes a resident villa manager and personal Thai chef. Ideal for families or destination wedding guests, the villa features five superb bedrooms including a kid-friendly bunk room.

The superbly landscaped estate centers around an ample, gem-toned swimming pool nestled amid lithe palm trees and vibrant potted plants. A lush lawn extends from the pool to the beach's soft white sands, with sun loungers oriented toward the vast panorama. The poolside sala features a bar, outdoor kitchen, and lovely wood dining table with expansive ocean views.

The villa's primary living area is the great room on the upper floor of the main pavilion. It features vaulted ceilings, sweeping views of the pool and ocean, cathedral windows, a dining table, and an adjacent chef's kitchen with breakfast bar. The décor is under-stated yet exquisite, with fine touches of Buddhist artwork and natural materials evoking a timeless Southeast Asian serenity. On the opposite side of this pavilion, a stairwell leads down into an oasis-like garden.

The villa features four bedrooms with double beds, as well as a bunkroom for one adult or two children. Each of the bedrooms enjoys an ensuite bathroom, and three include alfresco bathtubs on terraces with enchanting views.

A destination unto itself, Baan Ora Chorn is also a wonderful base for exploring Koh Samui. The town of Nathon is about ten miles away, where you can catch a boat for a daytrip to the outer islands, including Angthong National Marine Park. The inland forests include the Buddhist sites at Wat Kiri Wongkaram, Wat Sila Ngu, and Secret Budda Garden. Golfers are about forty minutes from the famed Santiburi Golf Course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Wake up early to find the perfect sunrise-vantage-point on the wrap-around balcony and lose yourself in panoramic ocean views at this luxurious Cabo casita. Pop back-and-forth between the pool and hot tub to strike a balance, do some grilling on the barbecue, and then head inside to catch the big game. Later, hop in a golf cart and explore the resort before you venture on to Cabo San Lucas. 

Spanish colonial architecture mixes with modern decor at this breezy seaside home. Gather the family for popcorn and movie; stretching out on the L-shaped sofa. Get creative in the stylish kitchen by trying your hand at local cuisine. After, mix up a cocktail or two, light up the fireplace and settle into the patio lounge for an incredible night under the stars with good friends. 

Casita 42 comes with daily housekeeping, a butler, and an on-site concierge, as well as a parking space within the gated community. Drop the kids off at Palmilla Kids Camp and keep up with your fitness routine at the gym or Club Espiritu’s pilates studio. Don’t feel like cooking? Bring in a private chef, have dinner at the Palmilla Resort’s restaurant or the poolside grill at Club Ninety-Six. 

Golfers are in good hands on the Cabo coast, right next door to Del Mar you’ll find one of Golf Magazine’s favorite’s, the Jack Nicklaus’ signature course at Palmilla. After a beer in the clubhouse, head to Palmilla Beach to cool off in the ocean. Then, set out for an exciting night of bar hopping, delicious seafood, and dancing down the coast in Cabo San Lucas. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Views of the picture-perfect sapphire sea meet sophisticated contemporary living spaces at Villa Baan Fan Noi. This stunning four-bedroom Koh Samui villa boasts thoughtful architecture that showcases the views from its perch over Chaweng Beach, as well as a thoughtful staff that will ensure you and up to eight friends or family members are pampered during your stay.

Your holiday at Villa Baan Fan Noi begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a villa manager, driver, housekeeper and Thai chef. For your comfort, the villa has air conditioning and 24-hour security; for your convenience, babysitting service is available at extra cost. This means you can relax and soak in the tropical sun from outdoor living areas with plenty of loungers around an infinity pool, or unwind inside with the help of the TVs, Wi-Fi and wine cellar.

The great room of this modern vacation rental rivals the outdoor living spaces for views, thanks to its fold-away glass walls. Pared-down furnishings such as wicker chairs and tuxedo-style sofas lend an easy sophistication in the open-concept living and dining areas. A tranquil courtyard with a water feature separates them from the sleek, fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the four bedrooms at this luxury residence is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, living area and private terrace. Nearly wall-to-wall sliding glass doors can be pushed open to let the warm breezes flow through, and for more indulgent moments, two of the bedrooms have stand-alone soaking tubs.

From the villa’s hillside location, it’s just a 5-minute drive to the island’s main ring road at Chaweng, which will bring you to some of Koh Samui’s best beaches, liveliest oceanfront bars and restaurants, and the thriving bistro scene at the famed Fisherman’s Village in Bophut. For an only-here day trip, head to Wat Plai Laem, or the Big Buddha Temple, or Na Muang Safari Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa 3 at Sangsuri Estate occupies a peaceful tropical cliff side that steps gently down to an undisturbed beach just a short drive north of Koh Samui’s main tourist town, Chaweng. This stunning, five bedroom villa is designed as a series of luxurious living and sleeping pavilions, set on four levels, and connected by stepped pathways spread through attractive, landscaped grounds. The property overlooks a meditative bay that is home to the postcard-perfect offshore island of Matlang.

Villa Sangsuri 3 features an appealing choice of private and communal spaces. The lower level beachside spa is an indulgent inclusion, even for a luxury villa of this size, and the addition of a private cinema room behind the lounge adds yet more appeal to the wide-ranging facilities. The dining pavilion sits to the left of the garden and boasts an eight-seat dining table and breakfast bar, served by a fully equipped resort-style kitchen to the rear.

An arched entrance leads directly down to a wide, landscaped garden adorned with flowering plants, mature trees and huge Balinese rocks filled with water lilies. A furnished relaxation sala is also perched poolside for shaded repose, complete with a giant mirror to reflect the breathtaking natural surroundings. The lounge sits to the right of this area, folding wood and glass doors on three sides to draw in the views and warm sea breezes. Hidden behind the lounge is the cinema room with pull down cinema screen and full digital entertainment system.

With a total of seven bedrooms, this villa can accommodate up to fourteen guests. The master suite boasts walk-in closet, high ceilings, wood and glass doors that open onto the pool and automated blinds on three sides for added privacy. In addition to the poolside terrace, the room also opens onto its own private balcony overlooking the beach and sea.

Despite being one of the only luxury villa estates on Koh Samui within easy reach of the many shops and nightlife options in Chaweng, Sangsuri Villa 3 enjoys one of the most secluded and peaceful locations on the island. The sheer size of the property and generous amount of private space available to guests makes this one of the most attractive choices on the island for a private wedding, group celebration or corporate retreat. Your dream villa awaits!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tidepools form and are washed away on the beach out front, but the swimming pool is always waiting at this airy contemporary villa in Bophut. The house is designed for indoor-outdoor living, with the pool terrace on the sea and a private courtyard separating its two air-conditioned pavilions. It’s 10 minutes or less to the beach, weekend market, and ferry connections in Nathon.

Listen to the water lap at the shore while splashing in the infinity pool, lying in the hammock, or trying out local produce on the gas barbecue. Find your flow inside in the dedicated yoga space. A partial staff of villa manager and housekeeper will oversee airport transfers and laundry service during your holiday.

Step through a slide-away glass wall from the waterfront terrace to an open-concept great room, whose two-story windows frame sea views to the horizon. Spread out on the sectional and around the live-edge dining table for 8. Kids can play on the mezzanine level while grown-ups prep a family dinner in the fully equipped kitchen.

This vacation rental is a few minutes’ drive from Nathon, the main port on Koh Samui and a great place to glimpse authentic Thailand life. Join locals and backpackers alike on the weekend walking street night market and watch fishing boats in the bay. It’s also 10 minutes or less by car to 3 different beaches, and close enough to top-rated Bophut Beach to spend the day there.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near this villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Experience the luxury service of a resort in the seclusion of a private home at Villa Mia. This dreamy Koh Samui vacation rental is fully staffed and has incredible indoor and outdoor living areas set back from the beach by a lawn. The oceanfront location is perfect for a relaxed family reunion, birthday or anniversary celebration with friends or even a tropical destination wedding.

Your holiday at Villa Mia includes a round-trip airport transfer, daily continental breakfast, in-villa spa treatments such as massages, and the services of a trained Thai chef, housekeeper and property manager. This leaves you free to enjoy the villa’s gorgeous infinity pool, loungers and sun beds, al-fresco living and dining areas, and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue and wet bar. Explore the bay in the double kayak, take the kids to the playground and stay active in the villa’s fitness room.

Villa Mia is designed to help you bask in the lush beachfront setting, with its outdoor living pavilion sunk into the pool and sliding glass doors that open the interiors to the ocean breeze. Like the al-fresco areas, the open-plan living spaces are comfortably stylish, with high ceilings, natural-fiber rugs and a fresh palette of white furnishings, from the sofa and dining chairs to the sleek cabinets in the fully equipped kitchen.

You’ll feel like you’re honeymooning again in the villa’s five bedrooms, each of which has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and lounge area, and opens to the terrace. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are beautifully furnished with a mix of natural textures and crisp white furnishings and upholstery, all accented by colorful pieces like floral-print pillows, botanical artwork and elegant vases.

Though it’s located on Chaweng Beach, Villa Mia has a quiet, secluded feel. At low tide, take a scenic stroll out to the neighboring island of Koh Matlang, or walk down the beach to explore Chaweng’s famed restaurants and bars. There are two golf courses only a short drive away, and for a unique, only-in-Thailand adventure, spend an afternoon at Wat Plai Laem (the Big Buddha temple) or Canopy Adventures Secret Falls.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Malabar is a gorgeous, oceanfront villa on the south shore of the island of Koh Samui. Situated beside the Golden Pagoda at Laem Sor Beach, the villa enjoys private seclusion and panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand. The contemporary structure combines elegantly minimalist lines and décor with exquisite natural accents that evoke a traditional Indonesian harmony and tranquility. Exterior and interior are seamlessly fused, while five king bedrooms provide ample accommodations for families and multiple couples.

The villa's swimming pool, just steps from the ocean's edge, includes deep and shallow areas for guests of all ages. Enjoy a refreshing dip beneath towering palm trees, and savor the delicious sunlight and breeze on poolside loungers and armchairs. After a trip to the beach in the afternoon, gather in the oceanfront sala for Balinese cocktails and barbeque meals from the alfresco kitchen; then linger outdoors at sunset, admiring the extraordinary metamorphosis of the sea and sky.

Floor-to-ceiling glass doors invite the ocean air and light into then-concept interior, where a gourmet kitchen serves a breakfast bar, two tables, and a generous lounge area oriented toward the horizon. Continental breakfast is included in the vacation rental, and guests may hire a personal chef to prepare extraordinary Thai meals. From the main living area, pass through a luminous corridor to the media room, with its sumptuous sectional and mounted television. A private office welcomes work and study, while the well-equipped fitness room is perfect for a refreshing workout before cooling off in the pool.

The villa's bedrooms all feature king beds, lounge areas, ensuite bathrooms, and direct access to the terrace. The master suite (in the main pavilion) and two primary guest suites (in a separate pavilion) enjoy spectacular ocean views, while their bathrooms include stand-alone showers and terrazzo tubs.

From Villa Malabar, you're an easy drive to Nikki Beach, Lemai Beach, and the town of Laem Sor, while the villages of Thong Krut and Taling Ngam are just a few minutes away. Golfers are within easy reach of Royal Samui Golf. Koh Samui Airport is just twenty-five kilometers from Villa Malabar, making it a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With two infinity pools, eight en-suite bedrooms, a friendly staff, and instant beachfront access, Inasia acts more like a resort, but this luxury vacation villa is all yours. Beachside lounges, outdoor bars, spacious open concept interiors, and pristine beachfront areas allow you and your guests an unprecedented amount of social space, making it easy to gather as a group or break off for more intimate occasions. Nearby, you’ll find the town of Lamai, Chaweng’s tourism center, golf, and adventure tourism activities.

Thai architecture takes modern contemporary style and opens it to embrace the beautiful beachfront environment. With wall-length openings in nearly every room, fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight have no trouble flowing through Inasia’s luxurious interior. Sleek and stylish designer furniture and high-end electronics decorate Inasia’s lounge areas. In the kitchens, you’ll love the modern-retro style appliances and functional working areas. Connected each separated space, you’ll find stone walkways, vibrant lawns, and mature palm trees.

Inasia has four beachfront units and four bedrooms in the Main House, all with en-suite bathrooms, and six come with king-sized beds. Wi-Fi, satellite television, baby equipment, and air conditioning are all included as well. Outside, you’ll have no trouble finding a new spot to enjoy cocktails with friends. The beachside lounge and dining area are perfect for social gatherings. And, with a housekeeper and chef on staff, you’ll have plenty of time to enjoy every bit of your next amazing Luxury Retreats beach getaway.

Lipa Noi, to which you’ll have instant beachfront access, is one of Samui’s most private and secluded. The water is shallow and clear, making it perfect for children and casual swimming. If you’re in the mood for a more populated beach, Lamia Beach and Chaweng Beach are two great options; both are lined with luxury resorts, beach bars, and nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated within Dhevatara Cove, one of the finest luxury communities on Koh Samui, Baan Samlarn offers a unique experience of this extraordinary island paradise. The beachfront villa features panoramic sunset views of the Gulf of Thailand, expansive outdoor living and dining areas, and exquisitely decorated interiors endowed with vintage furnishings, original artwork, and high-end modern appliances. Guests enjoy access to the community's sauna and fitness room as well as an extraordinary in-villa staff including a private Thai chef. Ideal for families, the villa features five superb bedroom suites accommodating ten guests.

The expansive swimming pool and hot tub are framed in a beautiful teak deck, with plentiful lounge chairs beckoning you to relish the sunlight or sip cool drinks in the shade of parasols. Step across the lush lawn onto the white-sand beach for a plunge in the luminous sea, and rinse in the outdoor shower before joining your loved-ones for an afternoon meal. Perched between the pool and beach, the open-air sala with lounge and dining table is ideal for alfresco delights in the ocean air.

Beside the pool deck, the fabulous great room pavilion features broad doors opening to the pool and oceanfront lawn. Lovely fans hang from the high, vaulted ceiling, and abundant natural light streams in through cathedral windows. At the far end of the pool is the main dining room, featuring an ocean-view table for eight beside an open wall. enter the villa via an enchanting stepping-stone path across a pond in the front garden.

The bedrooms are spacious and exquisitely furnished, and all open to the terrace, gardens, or a private balcony. Each room has its own charming character, with original artwork and a unique color palette harmonizing with the vibrant hues of the gardens and sea. All five rooms enjoy superb ensuite bathrooms, some with alfresco showers.

You may never want to leave the private sanctuary of Baan Samlarn, yet plentiful dining options, shops, and adventures are within an easy drive of your door. Taling Ngam Beach and the famous temples of Wat Nara Charoen Suk and Wat Kiri Wongkaram are lovely destinations, and both Paradise Park and Secret Buddha Garden are an easy drive inland through the exquisite forests of Koh Samui.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Listen to the waves lapping at the shores of Koh Samui from your own sleek private residence at Baan Hinyai. This incredible contemporary vacation rental just outside the town of Lamai offers direct access to the beach and expansive views over the sea. Its five bedrooms and full staff mean you can soak in the sunshine with up to ten friends or family members in modern luxury.

During your stay, a villa manager, Thai chef and housekeeper will see to your needs. An airport transfer and daily continental breakfast are also complimentary, and paddleboards, sea kayaks and windsurfing equipment are available on request. When you’re not out on the water, relax on the loungers surrounding the dramatic infinity pool, dine in the poolside sala, put a movie on the outdoor projector screens or share photos via Wi-Fi.

At the heart of Baan Hinyai is a beautiful open-plan great room with high ceilings and warm natural textures of stone and wood. A pair of sectionals has plenty of room for everyone to sit, as does a broad, live-edge dining table. Though chef service is included in your holiday, the great room also has a fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has four bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and sea views, as well as the same elements of wood and stone that make the great room so appealing.

With the beach at your doorstep, it’s easy to step out for a morning of building sandcastles or an afternoon of strolling, honeymoon-style, with your sweetheart. For a choice of shops and restaurants, make the 8 km drive into the town of Lamai. Don’t miss the chance to see the nearby Na Muang waterfall, a pretty cascade reached by a walk through a forest.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Although it’s designed in a minimalistic fashion, don't be fooled, this luxury vacation rental is absolutely loaded with top of the line features. Features like beachfront access to Natai Beach, a state of the art gym, and every bedroom having an ocean view, prove that this Summer Estate is simply the best. Located in Phang Nga, Thailand, this private luxury rental is perfect for a family beach vacation or a golf trip with friends.

Minimalistic interior design creates a sleek and stylish atmosphere. It doesn’t lean on gimmicks to impress, it’s impressive because it’s designed well. Guests focus is easily directed to the more important vacation desires, like watching the sun set over the ocean while you sip a glass of wine on your private beachfront. When it’s time to head back inside, you’ll be well taken care of. Modern designer furniture is the decor of the open concept living space. Numerous openings to the terrace create a free flowing environment for guests and fresh ocean breeze. The predominantly white colour scheme is clean and calming with hints of elegance. In the kitchen, high-end appliances and plenty of countertop workspace make meal prep a breeze, or you could let the included chef take care of it.

Outside, there’s essentially a whole other house on the terrace. With a stainless steel kitchen, barbecue, alfresco dining, and furnished living areas, you can exist outdoors just as easily as you can inside, which is ideal in such a perfect climate. Also on the terrace, there’s a refreshing infinity pool and lounge chairs. For some backyard or beachfront activity, Summer Estate comes with a pool raft, table tennis, body boards, sports equipment, Badminton, and a kayak.

About an hours’ drive from the villa, you’ll find the Red Mountain Golf Course and Old Town Phuket. Whether you’re looking for a scenic afternoon on a challenging golf course, or a shopping trip and a night out, you’ll find it along the coast.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover one of the best-kept secrets on Koh Samui at Villa Riva. Perched on a headland above secluded Bang Por Beach, this beautiful traditionally inspired vacation rental is a quiet, private escape perfect for a family reunion, a laid-back getaway with friends or a unique destination wedding. Its seven bedrooms, resort-worthy amenities and full staff provide luxury accommodations for up to fourteen guests.

Your holiday at Villa Riva begins with an airport meet-and-greet and continues with daily breakfast, plus the services of a Thai chef, English-speaking manager and housekeeper. Enjoy the views from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, custom jetted tub, and living and dining areas, practice your serve on the tennis court or unwind with the help of the home theater, wine cellar, and dry and wet saunas.

There’s plenty of room for everyone to gather in an open-concept great room, where inviting warm wood accents and crisp white tones adorn the sitting and dining areas. A graceful pagoda-inspired roof tops the double-height space, and fold-away glass doors to the terrace add to the breezy feel. While chef service is part of your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen.

The main house at Villa Riva has three bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. The property also has one pavilion with two king bedrooms, plus a second pavilion with one king bedroom that’s the ideal honeymoon-style retreat. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

With a stretch of beautiful beach just below the villa, it’s easy to step down to the shore and see what makes Koh Samui such a popular sun destination. (Hint: it’s to do with the soft sands and turquoise waters.) The villa is also just a 6 km drive from the nearest golf course, and a 10 km drive from shopping and dining in the town of Bophut.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Make lasting holiday memories at one of the finest properties on Cape Yamu at Villa Chloe. Set on a rise facing Phang Nga Bay, this beautifully designed luxury vacation rental boasts views of the islands neighboring Phuket, incredibly spacious indoor and outdoor living areas from which to enjoy them and a location close to beaches, golf and more.

Your stay at Villa Chloe begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a private chef, housekeeper and property manager. After a complimentary breakfast, spend the day lounging by the infinity pool, volleying on the estate’s tennis court or dreaming up dishes to prepare on the barbecue and enjoy around the al-fresco table. For the evenings, there’s a media room, a sound system and Wi-Fi.

Two levels of living space mean there’s plenty of room for friends and family to gather together or spread out. Upstairs, a vaulted ceiling is a traditional Thai touch in a sprawling living room. Downstairs, find an open-concept great room with sitting and dining areas, plus a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

There are two bedrooms in the main house at Villa Chloe and three in the guest house; all five have queen beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. One of the main-house bedrooms also has honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as an al-fresco jetted bathtub and sea views. Like the common spaces, the bedrooms are minimalist yet inviting, with neutral tones, polished floors and warm wood accents.

The villa is within easy driving distance of two golf courses, several beaches—including popular Bang Tao and Surin beaches—and plenty of shopping and dining options. Book an excursion from the nearby Royal Phuket Marina, find one-of-a-kind souvenirs in Phuket Old Town or spend a night out on the town along lively Bangla Road.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The luxury villa Koh Koon sprawls over the hillside overlooking Chaweng Bay on the island of Koh Samui. This East meets Mediterranean property offers an eclectic, yet harmonious mix of Asian and European styles. It’s tranquil location, coupled with its spacious grounds and stylish interiors make this vacation rental ideal for special events, family holidays and corporate retreats.

The open plan living and dining area features oversized couches, quirky lighting and mixed objets d’art. An aged-wood dining table seats eighteen. With wine flowing, music playing and laughter chiming, the villa’s chef will take you on a journey through Thai and foreign cuisine. Relax and enjoy a game of billiards, foosball or darts. There is also a multi-purpose area that can be used as a television lounge, massage room or additional sleeping area. The expansive infinity swimming pool takes center stage in the garden. To one side lies a pool bar and a dining sala, and to other, a covered pool lounge offers shade.

While Koh Koon could easily be mistaken for a Mediterranean countryside retreat from the outside, the interiors also showcase native Thai style. The terrain has been carefully considered with the buildings blending into their natural surroundings. Giant boulders have been retained as garden features. Stone walls, terracotta roof tiles, wrought iron fittings and aged wooden shutters give this villa a distinct French farmhouse feel. The large function deck, built around a majestic tree, is perfect for yoga or an intimate wedding ceremony.

Koh Koon accommodates up to fourteen adults and eight children. The master suite offers ocean views and a private terrace with alfresco shower. The en-suite bathroom includes his-and-hers marble vanities and a double rain shower. Koh Koon’s remaining seven bedrooms are housed in four separate pavilions. All have en-suite bathrooms and crisp, white linens. Polished concrete floors are cool underfoot, and Crete-stone walls add to the rustic feel. The bedrooms with their private terraces and seating areas offer solitude.

Koh Koon’s vast lawns are great for children to run and play. In the garden, guests can enjoy a friendly game of pétanque or practice their golfing techniques on the putting green. While Koh Koon may look rustic, the facilities and service are five-star. The professional staff will take care of every whim, and the in-house concierge service will be happy to arrange excursions.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Flanked by towering palm trees, the glistening pool of this top-tier Phuket villa instantly welcomes new arrivals with captivating blue pool and sweeping garden views. Begin the day with a refreshing dip, before taking breakfast in the shaded poolside dining area. Room after room of luxury comfort awaits, while 2 world class beaches plus a profusion of restaurants and bars are just moments away.

Glorious Phuket sunshine gently wakes newly-arrived guests at Villa Arteed, with comfortable bedrooms outfitted with subtle Thai decor, rich furnishings and and an abundance of space. Passing through the richly decorated living spaces and artfully-outfitted stairwell, guests can make the most of the massive kitchen, before relaxing on the sumptuous love-seats that pepper the open-air sheltered terrace. As the breeze ruffels the palm fronds that surround the villa, guests can choose to hit the in-house gym, have a blast in the games room, unwind in the villa’s mini spa, or simply dive into the entertainment system in the fully-outfitted TV room.

Located on Phuket’s happening western coast, this villa offers fantastic access to some of the very best beaches in Thailand, including Patong Beach and Karon Beach. An impressive range of restaurants, bars and nightclubs are within a few minutes’ drive, while outgoing guests are spoilt for choice with the range of nightlife options that fill the surrounding neighborhoods. Less than 30 minutes drive from the bustling city of Phuket, guests can explore the markets and bustling squares of that island metropolis, as well as the island’s fabled offshore cruises. These include day-trips to the stunning Phi Phi islands, where beautiful beaches are ringed by majestic limestone cliffs. After a day exploring what this lush part of Thailand has to offer, guests can retire to the gently-lit patio for a freshly-made cocktail as the moon shines down on the nearby beaches.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Anar is a stunning beachfront villa on the northwest coast of Koh Samui in Thailand. Situated directly on Laem Noi Beach, the newly-built villa features extraordinary outdoor living areas, exquisite interiors, and five superb king bedroom suites. Taking its name from the Persian word for "pomegranate," as well as from the word for "sun" in the Middle-earth of J.R.R. Tolkien's Lord of the Rings, Villa Anar is exceptional for its sublime sunset views.

Enjoy enchanting days luxuriating on elegant loungers in the brilliant sun, or sipping cool drinks in the shade of a breeze-quivered canopy. Dip into in the sparkling waters of your swimming pool and relax in its built-in lounge. Step onto the white sands of your secluded strand of beach and plunge into the turquoise ocean or venture in a kayak onto the glittering expanse. In the afternoon, return for an alfresco barbeque lunch on the terrace.

Sliding glass walls open between the pool terrace and the villa's main interior living area, inviting delicious breezes and sublime views into the home. The open-plan space, adjacent to the terrace, creates a lovely space for dinner parties or merely relaxing with family and friends. Savor a fine wine in the living room while beholding the ocean views. Prepare meals in the gourmet kitchen—fully equipped with Küppersbusch appliances and breakfast bar—and gather around the beautiful dining table of teak wood.

Each of the five bedroom suites is a luxury beachfront apartment in its own right, with sumptuous king bed, luminous and gorgeous décor, ensuite bathroom, lounge, safe, and doors opening to the pool and terrace. With couple-friendly accommodations for ten, the villa is ideal for destination wedding guests.

Villa Anar enjoys an extraordinary location for relishing the beaches, natural beauty, and cultural attractions of Koh Samui. Along with Laem Noi Beach out your door, you're within minutes of several other world-class beaches, including Nathon, Mae Nam, Lipa Noi, and Bophut, and Chaweng. The beachfront dining at Bang Por is within walking distance, and the Four Seasons Hotel is also within easy reach. The town of Nathon is just about six kilometers away. Golfers are minutes from Santiburi Samui Country Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Samara Villa is an idyllic oceanside retreat located on Koh Samui’s unspoiled west coast in Lipa Noi. Samara Villa has been designed to offer guests all the comforts and pleasures of contemporary living along the natural oceanfront setting that personifies this Thai island’s unique appeal. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

This stunning vacation rental looks out to an untroubled bay over a grassy lawn, and steps lead straight to the sea. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the long infinity-edge swimming pool. It’s both perfect for laps and laughs – with the swim-up wet bar. An intelligent use of outdoor space makes island life a pleasure, whether lounging in comfort or dining alfresco while piping tunes on the outdoor sound system. Interior perks include a wine fridge, an espresso machine, cable television, Wi-Fi, exercise room and video games. Entirely child-friendly, the villa features an impressive indoor playground built in a private garden isolated from the beach with security cameras and smart phone access, leaving parents worry-free!

This secure, walled property features Thai-influenced design combining natural materials and shingle roofs with the best contemporary finishes and high-end amenities. The open interiors are beautifully complemented by a fine collection of Asian art and artifacts. With its chic and elegant pavilions, this luxury oceanfront villa offers a convenient layout. The innovative, open-walled rooms allow you to wander barefoot between the bedrooms and living areas with ease, while surrounded by sparkling ocean views. The professional staff will take care of the details. Ask about the special meals prepared by a private chef!

Six exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to thirteen guests at this non-smoking villa. Five suites provide king size beds, televisions, ceiling fans and direct terrace access. The bunk room is safe and sure to be a hit with children! Samara Villa makes a great bet for a family or a special event such as a wedding or birthday.

Despite its secluded location, the villa’s sophisticated interiors and entertainment systems mean a carefree holiday. A range of island attractions and golf courses are also within easy reach of Samara Villa. Enjoy the spectacular tropical sunsets that are so famous in the southern Thai islands while enjoying your favorite cocktail – have your vacation, your way!

listing.listing_description:
With six luxuriously adorned bedrooms spread out along its lush estate, this beachfront villa acts more like a boutique resort, but Thansamaay is just for you. Located on the south-facing shores of Coco Beach on Thailand’s Island, Koh Samui, Villa Thansamaay is the perfect setting for a family vacation, wedding ceremony, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style. Within walking distance, you’ll find beachfront bars and restaurants, shops, and a yoga retreat. And, within a few miles, you’ll have access to the rainforest, golf, nightlife, and several more beach areas.

Each bedroom and common space at Villa Thansamaay features access to the terrace. And, with its compound-style layout, the open-air beach atmosphere is taken to a new level. You’ll love the seamless transitions between inside and out, and all of the different lounge areas throughout the property. Inside, designer furniture, high-end electronics, and contemporary pieces of art are thoughtfully arranged to promote a social, yet relaxing atmosphere.

Thansamaay’s vibrant estate is perfect for capturing sunrise and sunset views over the endless blue ocean. From the many outdoor living areas, sun loungers, swimming pool, and alfresco dining set, you’ll have an ever-present vista of the ocean and private beachfront. Inside, formal dining, a fully equipped kitchen, an espresso machine, and a wine fridge make meal prep a breeze. And, Wi-Fi, television, and air conditioning will make sure guests are cool and connected.

Just beyond the terrace, you’ll enjoy your own twenty-seven meter stretch of pristine sand and calm, clear waters on Coco Beach. If you’d like to explore some of Koh Samui’s more populated beach areas, Nikki and Lamai beaches are favorites among locals and visitors, with plenty to see and do on and around the beach. If there’s a golfer in your entourage, Royal Samui Golf Club is a challenging nine-hole course with fairways that wind along the coast for incredible ocean views. And, for more shopping, dining, and nightlife options, drive seven miles to Main Street.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience signature Thai hospitality and quintessential Phuket scenery at Baan Banyan. An attentive staff oversees every detail at this luxury vacation rental, and its perch above the treetops over Kamala Beach affords panoramic views of the Andaman Sea. Reserve this six-bedroom residence (of 4 amazing master suites, and 2 more bedrooms with less grandeur) for an unforgettable holiday with friends or a special occasion like a family reunion.

During your stay, a chef, property manager, housekeeper and security staff will ensure your comfort. Soak in the tropical sunshine in outdoor living areas featuring an infinity pool; al-fresco spaces for lounging, conversation and dining; and a barbecue. Other amenities range from fitness and entertainment rooms to a wine fridge, sound system and Wi-Fi.

Slide-away glass walls connect the outdoor living areas with the indoor ones, so you can enjoy the sea views and warm breezes even while inside. The heart of Baan Banyan is an open-plan great room with sleek sitting and dining areas, a stunning vaulted ceiling and colorful artwork. Though chef service is included in your stay, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar is available.

Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has a private en-suite bathroom, a balcony and an ocean view. There are four bedrooms with king beds, al-fresco showers and lounge areas, that are of a standard to rival any honeymoon suite. The other two bedrooms, in the main structure are of a slightly different positioning. They have two twin beds each, which can be combined into king beds on request.

Baan Banyan is located in what’s become known as “Millionaire’s Mile,” an exclusive neighborhood that stretches along the headland between Kamala Bay and Patong Beach. While this unparalleled setting is quiet, it’s only a short drive from local attractions such as the sandy arc of Kamala Beach, the dance extravaganzas of FantaSea, the local fare of Talad Kaset Night Market and a range of golf courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you’ve been looking for the beachfront escape of your dreams, simply make the 25 minute drive from the Phuket airport to Coastal Escape. This incredible luxury vacation rental offers an unparalleled location on Natai Beach, stylish and spacious living areas, and impeccable service and amenities. Book the five bedrooms for the ultimate family holiday or a tropical getaway with friends.

The villa’s private oceanfront living areas, from sitting and dining areas to an infinity pool and outdoor bar, make it easy to take in the panoramic Andaman Sea views.

The clean exterior lines and sliding glass walls lead to gorgeously designed, mod-inspired interiors. An L-shaped great room frames the pool terrace, offering ocean views from the living room, dining room and kitchen. The separate lounge area has the same flair—think plush area rugs, tufted seating and neutral tones peppered with colorful accents—but is a more intimate space for watching TV or using the Wi-Fi.

This villa has four bedrooms with king beds, lounge areas, and access to a terrace or balcony: three with ocean views and one with garden views. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and garden views. All five bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms — and the same contemporary take on mid-century style as the great room.

Spend your stay indulging in wellness and massage treatments in the villa’s own massage room or reliving your honeymoon with a hand-in-hand stroll along Natai Beach. If you’d like to see more of the area, drive into central Phuket or the nearby Sirinat National Park, ask staff to assist in reserving a tee time at the nearest golf course, or visit one of the three other beaches within day-trip distance.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This architectural jewel enjoys an extraordinary beachfront position on the east coast of Koh Samui, in the area of Lamai. The villa strikes an ideal balance between privacy and resort-like amenities, including a private beach, ample swimming pool, extraordinary private staff, and outstanding entertainment equipment. With multiple pavilions perched along the beach's white sands, the villa features five bedroom suites including a stunning master suite and a children’s room, making it a superb choice for family vacations on one of Southeast Asia's most enchanting shores.

The multi-tiered villa and terrace meld harmoniously with the lush hillside, the infinity pool mirroring a vast panorama of the Gulf of Thailand. Lounge chairs on the lovely wooden deck invite you to bask in the South Pacific sun, while shaded sitting areas offer a cool venue for sipping homemade refreshments. A lovely staircase leads down to the beach, where guests can venture out on the villa's kayak and paddleboard, or simply plunge into the luminous sea. Beachside hammocks welcome dreamy afternoons in the ocean breeze.

The main pavilion features a cavernous living room with high, vaulted ceilings and ocean views. Folding glass walls open to the terrace, inhaling the breeze into the home, while air conditioning keeps the interiors cool when needed. The gorgeous timber dining table shares an ample space with the gourmet kitchen, which includes a fine bar and high-grade appliance for your private Thai chef. Gorgeous natural wood surfaces, superb traditional artwork, and seashell-shaped chandeliers cast a serene ambiance throughout the luminous home.

Each of the five bedroom suites (including the children's room) features a king bed, high-end entertainment system, and well-appointed ensuite bathroom with tub and shower. Beautiful exposed wood and stone resonate with the natural beauty of this timeless island paradise, imburing your downtime hours with tranquility.

Beyond the private world of Baan Hinta, you'll find plentiful activities and destinations nearby for guests of all ages, including world-class watersports, renowned traditional temples, majestic waterfalls, Lamai Market, and the kid-friendly Coco Splash Adventure & Waterpark. Beach lovers will want to visit the placid and beautiful Chaweng Noi, one of the island's finest.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From the welcoming recliners of this idyllic Thai villa, guests can take in the stunningly blue waters of the Andaman sea and the green hillsides beyond. Complete with an impressive, flower-bordered infinity pool, guests can linger at the delightful wet bar and bask in the poolside seating and air-conditioned interiors. Minutes away lies renowned Patong Beach and Phuket island’s famous night-life.

Constructed with a nod to the traditional Lanna architectural style, the steep wooden roof of the villa and pool-house gives it a genuine sense of local character, helping integrate it into this tranquil seaside neighborhood. After a refreshing morning swim in the lengthy pool, relax in the games room or gather in the opulent living room, replete with spacious seating that accommodates large groups of friends or family. The interior water features add an air of tranquility and aquatic atmosphere to the property, and as the afternoon comes on, the scent of delicious local cuisine will gently drift through the property as your local chef ensures you are served nutritious meals during your stay.

Just a short walk from Villa Chanjar are the golden expanses of Patong Beach, one of the largest and best-known beaches on the island of Phuket. Guests can sunbathe or swim, or take to the waves for heart-racing jet-skiing and exhilarating boat outings. A huge range of good-time bars and restaurants are just a short walk from the villa, offering live music, karaoke, and energetic bar parties. Further inland, the forested paths of the island hide wildlife sanctuaries and bustling village markets, which are easily accessible via zippy scooter outings. Back at the villa, guests can relax with an amazing bathtub view of the bay, as the soft lights of the shore begin to glow at dusk.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
